nodes.bodyText: We really need to dedup this configuration code. 😅
It's OK to be a private field. @value will inline the value.
Yes it does not have to be. 😉
Ah, I didn't know that, I've learned a lot. Thanks!
Could create a MediaTypeSet and reuse it, instead of creating a new stream list again and again.
Let me address this once #2444 is merged. 😉
Oops realized that the MediaTypeSet cannot have a media type which has wildcard. So just use Set and iterate on it.
